Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This Redfish Specification-described type shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties contained in this object shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

Sessions.description: The link to a collection of sessions.
Sessions.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type SessionCollection.

ServiceRoot.description: The ServiceRoot schema describes the root of the Redfish service, located at the '/redfish/v1' URI.  All other resources accessible through the Redfish interface on this device are linked directly or indirectly from the service root.
ServiceRoot.longDescription: This resource shall represent the root of the Redfish service.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AccountService.description: The link to the account service.
AccountService.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type AccountService.

Chassis.description: The link to a collection of chassis.
Chassis.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ChassisCollection.

CompositionService.description: The link to the composition service.
CompositionService.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type CompositionService.

EventService.description: The link to the event service.
EventService.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type EventService.

Fabrics.description: The link to a collection of fabrics.
Fabrics.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type FabricCollection.

JsonSchemas.description: The link to a collection of JSON Schema files.
JsonSchemas.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type JsonSchemaFileCollection.

Links.description: The links to other resources that are related to this resource.
Links.longDescription: This property shall contain links to resources that are related to but are not contained by, or subordinate to, this resource.

Managers.description: The link to a collection of managers.
Managers.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ManagerCollection.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

RedfishVersion.description: The version of the Redfish service.
RedfishVersion.longDescription: This property shall represent the Redfish protocol version, as specified in the 'Protocol version' clause of the Redfish Specification, to which this service conforms.

Registries.description: The link to a collection of registries.
Registries.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type MessageRegistryFileCollection.

SessionService.description: The link to the sessions service.
SessionService.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type SessionService.

StorageServices.description: The link to a collection of storage services.
StorageServices.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type StorageServiceCollection.

StorageSystems.description: The link to a collection of storage systems.
StorageSystems.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type StorageSystemCollection.  This collection shall contain computer systems that act as storage servers.  The HostingRoles property of each such computer system shall contain a StorageServer entry.

Systems.description: The link to a collection of systems.
Systems.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource collection of type ComputerSystemCollection.

Tasks.description: The link to the task service.
Tasks.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type TaskService.

UUID.description: Unique identifier for a service instance.  When SSDP is used, this value contains the same UUID returned in an HTTP `200 OK` response from an SSDP `M-SEARCH` request during discovery.
UUID.longDescription: This property shall contain the identifier of the Redfish service instance.  If SSDP is used, this value shall contain the same UUID returned in an HTTP `200 OK` response from an SSDP `M-SEARCH` request during discovery.  RFC4122 describes methods to use to create a UUID value.  The value should be considered to be opaque.  Client software should only treat the overall value as a universally unique identifier and should not interpret any sub-fields within the UUID.

UpdateService.description: The link to the update service.
UpdateService.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to a resource of type UpdateService.

title: #ServiceRoot.v1_2_6.ServiceRoot
